verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! Give praise to the LORD from the heavens — praise him from the highest places.

verses.kjv: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
verses.ct: Praise him, all his angels — praise him, all his heavenly armies.

verses.kjv: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.
verses.ct: Praise him, sun and moon — praise him, every shining star.

verses.kjv: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.
verses.ct: Praise him, you highest heavens, and you waters above the heavens.

verses.kjv: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.
verses.ct: Let them all praise the name of the LORD, because he gave the command and they were created.

verses.kjv: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.
verses.ct: He established them forever and ever — he set a law that will never be broken.

verses.kjv: Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:
verses.ct: Praise the LORD from the earth, you great sea creatures and all ocean depths,

verses.kjv: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapours; stormy wind fulfilling his word:
verses.ct: lightning and hail, snow and clouds, powerful winds that carry out his command,

verses.kjv: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:
verses.ct: mountains and every hill, fruit trees and every cedar,

verses.kjv: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:
verses.ct: wild animals and all livestock, creatures that crawl and birds that fly,

verses.kjv: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:
verses.ct: rulers of the earth and every nation, leaders and all who govern the earth,

verses.kjv: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:
verses.ct: young men and young women alike, the elderly and children together —

verses.kjv: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
verses.ct: let them all praise the name of the LORD, because his name alone is supreme. His glory rises above the earth and heaven.

verses.kjv: He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: He has raised up strength for his people — the praise of all who are devoted to him — for the people of Israel, a people close to him. Praise the LORD!
